content: watch gameplay in action here on youtube 1 this pattern includes instructions for all 6 animals and the mat i also include a printable page of instructions that you can include if you gift this set the instructions are as follows set up place each animal in its matching-colored square on one end of the playing mat how to play roll the die to start the game match the color rolled to the corresponding animal and move that animal one square forward towards the opposite end of the mat keep rolling and moving animals forward based on the color rolled example if you roll green move the green frog to the next square in its row winning the game the game ends when the first animal reaches the opposite sides corresponding colored square connect with me here 2 i do not charge for my patterns but if you would like to support my work you can tip me on venmo @thoseyellowthings 1 https //youtube com/shorts/u9gnmxkntco 2 https //www flowcode com/page/thoseyellowthings
